text: What the Day Owes the Night is a novel by Algerian writer Yasmina Khadra. It was originally written and published in French. The English translation was produced by Frank Wynne, and published by Heinemann in 2010. ==Film adaptation== The 2012 film What the Day Owes the Night is based on the novel. ==Awards== * Lire magazine - Best book of the year (2008) ==References== Category:2010 novels Category:Algerian novels Category:Algerian novels adapted into films Category:French-language novels
title: What the Day Owes the Night
